propertyDescriptions.study_state_or_province: Please enter the study state or province
propertyDescriptions.race: What race groups are included in the study population?
propertyDescriptions.ethnicity: What ethnicities are included in the study population?
propertyDescriptions.sampled_environmental_media: What environmental media were sampled to access exposure?
propertyDescriptions.survey_based_methods_used: Were survey-based methods used to assess exposures?
propertyDescriptions.survey_method: What type of survey method was used?
propertyDescriptions.study_data_collection_years: What is the study time period in years?
propertyDescriptions.gender_identity: What gender identities are included in the study population?
propertyDescriptions.study_life_stage: What is the life stage of the study population?
propertyDescriptions.biological_sex: What biological sexes are included in the study population?
propertyDescriptions.study_sampling_method: What is the study sampling method?
propertyDescriptions.occupation: What is the occupation or industry of the population (if an occupational study)?
propertyDescriptions.exposure_stressor: What type of environmental stressor was evaluated?
propertyDescriptions.environmental_measurement: What type of exposure assessment method was used?
propertyDescriptions.study_environmental_exposures_assessed: If chemical contaminants were the focus, what class of chemicals were studied?
propertyDescriptions.water_sampling_method: For water samples, what type of water was sampled?
propertyDescriptions.air_sampling_location: For air samples, what air was the air sampling location?
propertyDescriptions.biomarkers_of_exposure_used: Were biomarkers of exposure used to assess exposure?
propertyDescriptions.skin_sample_collection_methods: For skin samples, what type of sampling method was used?
propertyDescriptions.exposure_model: What type of model was used?
propertyDescriptions.chemical_physical_biological_exposure_mo: Were models of chemical, physical, or biological processes used to assess exposure?
propertyDescriptions.exposure_route: What was the primary exposure route of focus?
propertyDescriptions.quality_control_measures_reported: Were quality control measure reported (blanks, duplicates)?
propertyDescriptions.limit_of_detection_reported: Was the limit of detection reported?
propertyDescriptions.pfas_substances: Please enter any PFAS substances studied
